errors.GEOLOCATION_NOT_SUPPORTED: Geolocation does not seem to be supported on your device or browser.
errors.GEOLOCATION_ERROR: We are not able to locate your position, this might affect some features of the application.
errors.GEOLOCATION_PERMISSION_DENIED: $t(errors.GEOLOCATION_ERROR)</br>It seems you did not give permission to locate you.
errors.GEOLOCATION_POSITION_UNAVAILABLE: $t(errors.GEOLOCATION_ERROR)</br>It seems the internal source of position returned an internal error.
errors.GEOLOCATION_POSITION_TIMEOUT: $t(errors.GEOLOCATION_ERROR)</br>It seems the time allowed to acquire it was reached before the information was obtained.
errors.ALERTS_LIMIT: Too much alerts to display all of them
errors.CANNOT_CHECK_ALERT_MISSING_SERVICE: Last check failed due to unavailable service
errors.CANNOT_CHECK_ALERT_MISSING_DATA: Last check failed due to unavailable data

activity.SAVING_LABEL: Please wait while saving layer data,</br>processed {{processed}} over {{total}} features
activity.INVALID_FEATURES_DIALOG_MESSAGE: Your layer contains {{features.length}} elements with invalid geometry (e.g. self-intersection). As a consequence they will be removed prior to saving.
activity.DOWNLOAD_INVALID_FEATURES_LABEL: By checking this option the invalid features will be exported to a file before saving
activity.SAVE_DIALOG_MESSAGE: Your layer contains too much elements and has been optimized to be smoothly displayed.</br>As a consequence, it will only be visible at a local scale from a given zoom level.
activity.REMOVING_LABEL: Please wait while removing layer data
activity.REMOVE_DIALOG_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to remove {{layer}} from your workspace ?

editLayers.REMOVE_FEATURE_DIALOG_MESSAGE: Are you sure you want to remove this feature from your workspace ?

tooltip.start: Click and drag to draw circle.
Click map to place circle marker.

tooltip.end: Click first point to close this shape.
Click last point to finish line.

tooltip.start: Click and drag to draw rectangle.

tooltip.text: Drag handles or markers to edit features.
Click on a feature to remove.

geolocation.TITLE: My position
geolocation.POPUP: You are within {distance} {unit} from this point
geolocation.OUTSIDE_MAP_BOUNDS: You seem located outside the boundaries of the map

schemas.CATALOG_NAME_FIELD_LABEL: Enter the name of the new layer
schemas.CATALOG_DESCRIPTION_FIELD_LABEL: Enter the description of the new layer
schemas.FAVORITE_VIEW_NAME_FIELD_LABEL: Enter the name of this view
schemas.FAVORITE_VIEW_DESCRIPTION_FIELD_LABEL: Enter the description of this view
schemas.LAYER_CATEGORY_NAME_FIELD_LABEL: Enter the name of this category
schemas.LAYER_CATEGORY_ICON_FIELD_LABEL: Select an icon for this category
schemas.LAYER_CATEGORY_LAYERS_FIELD_LABEL: Select the layers in this category
schemas.LAYER_CATEGORY_EXCLUSIVE_FIELD_LABEL: Make selection exclusive within this category

navigation-bar.NAVIGATION_BAR_LABEL: This bar allows to quickly execute recurring actions on the map.
navigation-bar.TOGGLE_MAP_LABEL: Switch to 2D map view using this button.
navigation-bar.TOGGLE_GLOBE_LABEL: Switch to 3D map view using this button.
navigation-bar.GEOLOCATE_LABEL: Recenter the map on your location and display it using this button.
navigation-bar.SEARCH_LOCATION_LABEL: Seek for an address using this button.
navigation-bar.LOCATION_SEARCHING_LABEL: Type part of your address and select among the proposed locations to center the map on.
navigation-bar.SEARCH_BACK_LABEL: Then stop searching by going back to the actions.
navigation-bar.FAVORITE_VIEWS_LABEL: Manage your favorite views using this button. A favorite view is used to restore your current context later,
navigation-bar.FAVORITE_VIEWS_LINK_LABEL: How to manage your favorite views
navigation-bar.TOOLS_LABEL: Select among available tools using this button.
navigation-bar.TRACK_LOCATION_LABEL: Display the coordinates of a location using this button.
navigation-bar.COPY_LOCATION_LABEL: Copy the coordinates in your clipboard using this button.
navigation-bar.LOCATION_TRACKING_LABEL: Drag the screen to display the coordinates of its center and release to keep track of it.
navigation-bar.TRACK_BACK_LABEL: Then stop tracking by going back to the actions.
navigation-bar.TOGGLE_VR_LABEL: Switch to Virtual Reality (VR) mode with this button.
navigation-bar.TOGGLE_FULLSCREEN_LABEL: Switch to fullscreen mode with this button.
navigation-bar.TOGGLE_CATALOG_LABEL: Open the catalog with this button.

favorite-views.FAVORITE_VIEWS_LIST_LABEL: When you have defined some favorite views they are listed here, otherwise you can directly create your first one.
favorite-views.FAVORITE_VIEWS_LIST_ACTIONS_LABEL: Sort your views by name or update time and seek for a target one.
favorite-views.FAVORITE_VIEW_ACTIONS_LABEL: Remove a view by using this button.
favorite-views.ADD_FAVORITE_VIEW_LABEL: Add a new views using this button.
favorite-views.FAVORITE_VIEW_NAME_LABEL: Enter the name of your new view.
favorite-views.FAVORITE_VIEW_DESCRIPTION_LABEL: Enter the description of your new view.
favorite-views.FAVORITE_VIEW_LAYERS_LABEL: Select if the currently active layers will be restaured with this view.
favorite-views.CREATE_FAVORITE_VIEW_LABEL: Confirm the creation of your new favorite view.

catalog-panel.CATALOG_LABEL: The catalog allows to manage data displayed on your map.
catalog-panel.CATEGORIES_LABEL: The data are organised into different categories.
catalog-panel.CATEGORY_LABEL: Select a category to list all available data layers.
catalog-panel.SHOW_LAYER_LABEL: Select a layer to show it on the map, it will then be highlighted in the list.
catalog-panel.MIN_LEVEL_LABEL: When a layer is not visible according to your scale it will be disabled, you must zoom in to make it show on the map.
catalog-panel.HIDE_LAYER_LABEL: A new selection will hide it.
catalog-panel.METEO_MODEL_LABEL: Regarding meteorological data you can also switch the prediction model if multiple are available.
catalog-panel.METEO_LAYERS_LABEL: Each layer will then target data of a specific meteorological element from this model.
catalog-panel.MANAGE_LAYER_CATEGORIES_LABEL: You can manage the categories of your own data layers.
catalog-panel.CATEGORIES_LIST_LABEL: When you have defined some categories they are listed here, otherwise you can directly create your first one.
catalog-panel.CATEGORIES_LIST_ACTIONS_LABEL: Sort your categories by name or update time and seek for a target one.
catalog-panel.CATEGORY_ACTIONS_LABEL: Update or remove a category by using these buttons.
catalog-panel.ADD_CATEGORY_LABEL: Add a new category using this button.
catalog-panel.LAYER_CATEGORY_NAME_LABEL: Enter the name of your new category.
catalog-panel.LAYER_CATEGORY_ICON_LABEL: Enter the icon of your new category.
catalog-panel.LAYER_CATEGORY_LAYERS_LABEL: Select the layers to be part of this category.
catalog-panel.LAYER_CATEGORY_EXCLUSIVE_LABEL: Set if only one layer should be visible at a time in this category.
catalog-panel.CREATE_NEW_LAYER_CATEGORY_LABEL: Confirm the creation of your new category in the catalog.

timeline.TIMELINE_LABEL: The timeline allows to quickly execute actions related to the time of displayed data.
timeline.DATE_LABEL: Jump to any given date by using this button.
timeline.NOW_LABEL: Stick to real-time using this button.
timeline.NEXT_STEP_LABEL: Go forward in time to the next step as configured in your settings.
timeline.PREVIOUS_STEP_LABEL: Go backward in time to the previous step as configured in your settings.
timeline.SETTINGS_LINK_LABEL: How to update your settings in the main menu
timeline.PICK_MINUTES_LABEL: Change the minutes of current time.
timeline.NEXT_HOUR_LABEL: Go forward in time to the next hour.
timeline.PREVIOUS_HOUR_LABEL: Go backward in time to the previous hour.
timeline.PICK_HOUR_LABEL: Or pick the hours of current time.
timeline.NEXT_DAY_LABEL: Go forward in time to the next day.
timeline.PREVIOUS_DAY_LABEL: Go backward in time to the previous day.

fab.PROBE_LABEL: Probe weather forecast data at a specific location.
fab.PROBE_CURSOR_LABEL: After selecting this option click on a target location on the map to display related forecast data.
fab.ADD_LAYER_LINK_LABEL: How to add a new data layer

add-layer.ADD_LAYER_LINK_LABEL: How to add others types of data layers
add-layer.FILE_LABEL: Select your data file in GeoJSON format.
add-layer.SERVICE_LABEL: Enter the URL of the GetCapabilities request for the target OGC service.
add-layer.SERVICE_LAYER_LABEL: Select the target OGC service layer to connect to.
add-layer.LAYER_NAME_LABEL: Enter the name of your new data layer.
add-layer.LAYER_DESCRIPTION_LABEL: Then provide a description for your new data layer.
add-layer.LAYER_FEATURE_ID_LABEL: Last, choose an identifier to uniquely identify the features of your layer.
add-layer.LAYER_STYLE_LABEL: Select the style to be used for your layer.
add-layer.LAYER_SCHEMA_LABEL: Select the data schema of your features (JSON schema file).
add-layer.IMPORT_LAYER_LABEL: Import existing data as a new data layer.
add-layer.IMPORT_NEW_LAYER_LABEL: Confirm the creation of your new layer and the map will be centered on your new layer.
add-layer.CONNECT_LAYER_LABEL: Connect your layer to a remote OGC service (WMS, WFS, WMTS, TMS).
add-layer.CONNECT_NEW_LAYER_LABEL: Confirm the creation of your new layer.
add-layer.CREATE_LAYER_LABEL: Create a new blank data layer based on a data schema.
add-layer.CREATE_LAYER_LINK_LABEL: How to create a new data layer
add-layer.CREATE_NEW_LAYER_LABEL: Confirm the creation of your new layer and start editing the data on the map.

KOwsServiceField.WFS_MISSING_GEOJSON_SUPPORT: The WFS service has no support for GeoJSON, which is required.

KOwsLayerField.UNSUPPORTED_LAYER_CRS: The projection used by this layer is not supported.

KPositionIndicator.CANNOT_COPY_POSITION: Unable to copy the position to clipboard. Your browser does not support this functionality

KTimeSeries.CENTER_ON: Center the view on the probed location

KFeaturesFilter.TITLE: Data filter for layer {{layer}}
KFeaturesFilter.SELECT_PROPERTY_LABEL: Select a target property to start
KFeaturesFilter.ADD_FILTER: Select a target property to add a filter on

KFeaturesChart.SELECT_PROPERTY_LABEL: Select a target property to start
KFeaturesChart.TITLE: Graph for layer {{layer}}

KLayerStyleForm.ADD_POINT_STYLE: Select a target property to add an icon for
KLayerStyleForm.ADD_LINE_STYLE: Select a target property to add a style for
KLayerStyleForm.ADD_POLYGON_STYLE: Select a target property to add a style for
KLayerStyleForm.ADD_POPUP: Select target properties to use as popup
KLayerStyleForm.ADD_TOOLTIP: Select a target property to use as tooltip
KLayerStyleForm.ADD_INFOBOX: Select target properties to use as information box

KLayersSelector.LAYER_DISABLED: Zoom in to visualise this layer

KInformationBox.CENTER_ON: Center the view on the object
KInformationBox.COPY_PROPERTIES: Copy the values to the clipboard
KInformationBox.CANNOT_COPY_PROPERTIES: Unable to copy the values to clipboard. Your browser does not support this functionality
KInformationBox.CANNOT_EXPORT_FEATURE: Unable to export the object. Your browser does not support this functionality

KMapillaryWidget.CENTER_ON: Center the view on the Mapillary marker
KMapillaryWidget.NO_IMAGE_FOUND_CLOSE_TO: No image found close to your location

KAddLayer.TITLE: Add a new layer
KAddLayer.NAME_FIELD_LABEL: Enter the name of the new layer
KAddLayer.DESCRIPTION_FIELD_LABEL: Enter the description of the new layer

KConnectLayer.SERVICE_FIELD_LABEL: Select or enter a query to get the capabilities of the remote service
KConnectLayer.LAYER_FIELD_LABEL: Select the layer to access to
KConnectLayer.STYLE_FIELD_LABEL: Select the style of the new layer
